nodes.text: Zilok'k was a Gree who arrived on the planet Ilum to observe the Gray Secant, an ancient Gree starship, during the Galactic War. Along with Trikat'k and a number of Gree-equipped bodyguards, Zilok'k served as a representative of the Gree Enclave to the Sith Empire in the Western Ice Shelf's Imperial base.

Zilok'k was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.7: Return of the Gree, as a Gree Reputation Vendor for Imperial players during the Relics of the Gree World Event.
